title: 怎么禁止羊驼复制
author: Night-夜梦
txt_content: 如题，服务器里总是有玩家使用羊驼复制，求解决QAQ

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
换成 paper 即可

或者安装这个插件 https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-849068-1-1.html

replies.author: 智乃offical
replies.txt_content: 禁止行商羊驼，或者kill@e[type=羊驼]

replies.author: Night-夜梦
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-11 18:36
换成 paper 即可

或者安装这个插件 https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-849068-1-1.html
